Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the sale and financing of used automobiles by second-hand automobile dealers
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Sale and financing of used automobiles by second-hand automobile dealers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring second-hand automobile dealers to post and distribute a bill of rights to consumers
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring second-hand automobile dealers to post and distribute a bill of rights to consumers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring secondhand automobile dealers to disclose whether automobiles have been recalled by the automobiles’ manufacturers
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring secondhand automobile dealers to disclose whether automobiles have been recalled by the automobiles’ manufacturers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring secondhand automobile dealers to disclose whether automobiles have been recalled by the automobiles’ manufacturers
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring secondhand automobile dealers to disclose whether automobiles have been recalled by the automobiles’ manufacturers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring secondhand automobile dealers to disclose whether automobiles have been recalled by the automobiles’ manufacturers
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring secondhand automobile dealers to disclose whether automobiles have been recalled by the automobiles’ manufacturers.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring secondhand automobile dealers to disclose whether automobiles have been recalled by the automobiles’ manufacturers
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Requiring secondhand automobile dealers to disclose whether automobiles have been recalled by the automobiles’ manufacturers.

Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
